title: The Foundation Game: Beginning
description: The Chief Financial Officer at a nonprofit Foundation goes rouge!The Foundation Game. A global web of political and financial deceptive activities concealed under the auspices of a nonprofit foundation, highlighting the conflicts between the public good and personal quest for wealth. Power, corruption and and criminal schemes threaten the lives and reputations of corporate executives and politicians involved with the organization. The first book Beginning introduces the characters Margo Maxwell and her nemesis Jonathan Ross in a fast-moving political fiction about criminal and unethical behavior involving officers of the nonprofit, along with Silicon Valley players, Interpol, FBI and a US Senator.
author: Brenda Kempster
